help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

region.label: Region
region.description: Specify the region of the Amazon Athena for the data source

s3_output_location.label: S3 Output Location
s3_output_location.description: Specify S3 bucket location to save the results of query in s3 bucket

vpcflow_database_name.label: vpcflow service database name
vpcflow_database_name.description: Specify database name containing vpcflow service logs table from which the data to be queried

vpcflow_table_name.label: vpcflow service table name
vpcflow_table_name.description: Specify vpcflow service table name from which the data to be queried

guardduty_database_name.label: Guardduty service database name
guardduty_database_name.description: Specify database name containing guardduty service logs table from which the data to be queried

guardduty_table_name.label: Guardduty service table name
guardduty_table_name.description: Specify guardduty service table name from which the data to be queried

aws_access_key_id.label: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication

aws_iam_role.label: AWS IAM Role
aws_iam_role.description: AWS IAM Role is required for only AWS role-based authentication

aws_secret_access_key.label: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication
